trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: In certain situations and for specific types, multiple packaging progress events occur at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 특정 상황에서 및 특정 형식에 대 한 여러 패키징 진행률 이벤트가 동시에 수행 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: These logically distinct, but temporally identical, events are combined into a single <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent> and `numberCompleted` is more than 1.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 논리적으로 구분 되지만 일시적으로 동일한 이벤트를 단일으로 결합 됩니다 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent>및 `numberCompleted` 1 보다 크면.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you print, font subsetting is performed every four pages.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 인쇄, 글꼴 하위 집합은 수행할 때 모든&4; 페이지입니다.

trans-unit.source: Each page must be cached until the subsetting is complete, and then all four <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> events occur at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 각 페이지의 하위 집합이 완료 될 때까지 캐시 해야 하며 그러면 네 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>이벤트가 동시에 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the resulting <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs> sets `action` to <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> and sets `numberCompleted` to 4.
trans-unit.target: 결과 대 한 생성자 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs>설정 `action` 를 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>설정 `numberCompleted` 4.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a package consists of a single four-page document that uses one font and no images or other resources, the sequence of events might occur as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 한 패키지를 구성 하는 하나의 글꼴 및 이미지가 없습니다. 또는 기타 리소스를 사용 하는 단일&4; 페이지 문서, 이벤트의 순서는 다음 표에 나와 있는 것 처럼 발생할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: **The sequence of events for a simple package** AddingDocumentSequence 1 AddingFixedDocument 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 FontAdded 1 FixedPageCompleted 4 FixedDocumentCompleted 1 DocumentSequenceCompleted 1 XpsDocumentCommitted 1
trans-unit.target: **간단한 패키지에 대 한 이벤트의 시퀀스** AddingDocumentSequence 1 AddingFixedDocument 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 FontAdded 1 FixedPageCompleted 4 FixedDocumentCompleted 1 DocumentSequenceCompleted 1 XpsDocumentCommitted 1

trans-unit.source: The action that the packaging process is currently performing.
trans-unit.target: 패키징 프로세스에서 현재 수행 하는 작업입니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of simultaneous times that the specified `action` occurred.
trans-unit.target: 동시 횟수를 지정 된 `action` 발생 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates what action is currently occurring in the packaging process.
trans-unit.target: 패키징 프로세스에서 어떤 작업은 현재 진행 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction"></xref> that represents the part of the packaging process that is currently occurring.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction"> </xref> 현재 진행 중인 패키징 프로세스의 일부를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of simultaneous times that the action that is identified in <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*> has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 동시 횟수를 가져옵니다에서 식별 되는 작업 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*>발생 했습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*>

trans-unit.source: In certain situations and for specific types, multiple packaging progress events occur at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 특정 상황에서 및 특정 형식에 대 한 여러 패키징 진행률 이벤트가 동시에 수행 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: These logically distinct, but temporally identical, events are combined into a single <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent> and NumberCompleted is more than 1.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 논리적으로 구분 되지만 일시적으로 동일한 이벤트를 단일으로 결합 됩니다 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent>NumberCompleted는 1 이상 및.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you print, font subsetting is performed every four pages.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 인쇄, 글꼴 하위 집합은 수행할 때 모든&4; 페이지입니다.

trans-unit.source: Each page must be cached until the subsetting is complete, and then all four <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> events occur at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 각 페이지의 하위 집합이 완료 될 때까지 캐시 해야 하며 그러면 네 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>이벤트가 동시에 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs> sets <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> and sets NumberCompleted to 4.
trans-unit.target: 그 결과 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs>설정 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action%2A>를 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>NumberCompleted 4로 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a package consists of a single four-page document that uses one font and no images or other resources, the sequence of events might occur as shown in the following table: **The sequence of events for a simple package** AddingDocumentSequence 1 AddingFixedDocument 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 FontAdded 1 FixedPageCompleted 4 FixedDocumentCompleted 1 DocumentSequenceCompleted 1 XpsDocumentCommitted 1
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 한 패키지를 구성 하는 하나의 글꼴 및 이미지가 없습니다. 또는 기타 리소스를 사용 하는 단일 4 페이지 문서, 이벤트의 시퀀스 발생할 수 있습니다는 다음 표에 나와 있는 것 처럼: **간단한 패키지에 대 한 이벤트의 시퀀스** AddingDocumentSequence 1 AddingFixedDocument 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 FontAdded 1 FixedPageCompleted 4 FixedDocumentCompleted 1 DocumentSequenceCompleted 1 XpsDocumentCommitted 1

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> that represents the number of simultaneous times that the action that is identified in <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*> has occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>동시 시간을 나타내는 하에서 식별 되는 작업 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*>발생 했습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*> </xref:System.Int32>
